::English::

Original title: The Left Hand of God
Year: 1955
Length: 87 min.
Director: Edward Dmytryk
Screenplay: Alfred Hayes
Music: Victor Young
Photographs: Franz Planner
Starring: Humphrey Bogart, Gene Tierney, Lee J. Cobb, Agnes Moorehead, G.S. Marshall, Jean Porter, Carl Benton Reid, Victor Sen Yung, Philip Ahn, Benson Fong

Synopsis:
----------------
Jim Cardomy U.S. pilot is forced to survive at all costs after the downing of his plane in China. You'll need to pose as a priest by a Catholic mission. The missionaries hope to a totally different person to Jim, who happens to be a tough guy but whose decisions are very effective in a China racked by civil war. There he meets Anne Scott, widow, a nurse who works in the mission, and whose friendship becomes a whirlwind romance.


DVD Features:
--------------------
Contents: 1 Disc.
Picture: 1.78:1 16 / 9 anamorphic.
Audio: Dolby Digital Mono English, Castilian.
Subtitles: Castilian.

Artistic team.
